section1.desc: Smart Order System for Your Business

Toko.delete:
All data on your merchant, including wallets, transactions, products, teams will be deleted.
THIS COMMAND CANNOT BE UNDONE!

Wallet.no_wallet_title: You do not have a wallet account for this merchant yet
Wallet.no_wallet: The wallet account creation is only done once
Wallet.delete: The wallet account will be deleted ONLY if you delete your merchant. So if your wallet still contains balance, please withdraw your balance first before deleting the merchant.
Wallet.delete_wallet: If your wallet still contains balance, please withdraw your balance first before deleting the merchant
Wallet.online_payment: This merchant must create a wallet account to activate `ONLINE PAYMENT`.
Wallet.online_payment_owner: If you are the owner of this merchant, you can create a wallet account on the Business Page.
Wallet.online_payment_team: If you are not the owner of this merchant, please contact the owner of this merchant and ask him to register a wallet account for this merchant.

Outlet.op_desc: When enabled, your customers can make online payments using Bank, E-Wallet, or QRIS
Outlet.cod_desc: When enabled, your customers can make payments directly after placing an order, for example paying directly at the cashier
Outlet.so_desc: When enabled, your customers will be able to place an order directly through the website
Outlet.tn_desc: When enabled, your customers and cashier must input the table number when ordering
Outlet.admin_help: When enabled, this user gets admin privileges. This user can add, edit and/or delete product, team, outlet settings, but cannot delete outlets. Only merchant owners can delete outlets.

instruction.title: Payment Instruction
instruction.cod:
Go to the cashier.
Tell the cashier if you want to make a payment for the online orders.
The cashier will ask for your transaction ID listed above.
Make payment.
After paying, an E-Receipt will be sent to your email.

qris.other: and other applications that accept QRIS

ewallet.redirect: Redirecting you to {what} checkout page in a moment…
